attributes.action: To abolish inhumane treatment of animals and promote more free range farming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Battery chickens. Their life: live in cage for entire period of life and be forced to lay babies which will either then be eaten or live to be another battery chicken. Over a million chickens are killed each day. Cruelly slaughtered, and we must stop this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
